p: Cinnamon oil, known for its healing properties, is a product of the distillation with water vapor of three raw materials: (i) leaves and young twigs of Chinese cinnamon ( Cinnamomoum cassia [syn aromaticum] Blume); (ii) Ceylon cinnamon leaves ( Cinnamomum zeylanicum Blume [syn C. verum]; and (iii) Ceylon cinnabar bark [ 33].
